description:
The investment seeks to replicate investment results that generally correspond to the Inspire Corporate Bond Impact Index.
 The fund generally will invest at least 80% of its total assets in the component securities of the index. The index provider selects domestic corporate bonds issued by companies that have market capitalizations of $5 billion or more and are included in the S&P 500 Investment Grade Corporate Bond Index using the Inspire Impact Score®, a proprietary selection methodology that is designed to assign a score to a particular security based on the security's alignment with biblical values and the positive impact that company has on the world.
